領収証はどうされますか？	<div class='notes'>018.5 Special Expressions - Causative and Passive Verbs - Using passive form to show politeness</div> Definitions:<br><br>
なさる	<div class='notes'>1</div> Definitions:<br><br>Honorific form of する
致す	<div class='notes'>2</div> Definitions:<br><br>Humble form of する
いらっしゃる / おいでになる	<div class='notes'>3</div> Definitions:<br><br>Honorific form of 行く, 来る, or いる.
参る	<div class='notes'>4</div> Definitions:<br><br>Humble form of 行く and 来る.
おる	<div class='notes'>5</div> Definitions:<br><br>Humble form of いる
ご覧になる	<div class='notes'>6</div> Definitions:<br><br>Honorific form of 見る.
拝見する	<div class='notes'>7</div> Definitions:<br><br>Humble form of 見る.
伺う	<div class='notes'>8</div> Definitions:<br><br>Humble form of 聞く.
おっしゃる	<div class='notes'>9</div> Definitions:<br><br>Honorific form of 言う
申す / 申し上げる	<div class='notes'>10</div> Definitions:<br><br>Humble form of 言う
差し上げる	<div class='notes'>11</div> Definitions:<br><br>Humble form of あげる.
下さる	<div class='notes'>12</div> Definitions:<br><br>Honorific form of くれる.
いただく	<div class='notes'>13</div> Definitions:<br><br>Humble form of もらう, 食べる, and 飲む.
召し上げる	<div class='notes'>14</div> Definitions:<br><br>Honorific form of 食べる and 飲む
ご存知 (です)	<div class='notes'>15</div> Definitions:<br><br>Honorific form of 知っている.
存じる	<div class='notes'>16</div> Definitions:<br><br>Humble form of 知る.
 荷物 	<span class=jp> <ruby><rb>荷</rb><rt>に</rt></ruby><ruby><rb>物</rb><rt>もつ</rt></ruby> </span><br><br> baggage  <br>   <br><br> </span><br><table width=0><tr><td align=left> 
 <div class='expression'>むかしむかし、あるところに、おじいさんとおばあさんが住んでいました。</div>         	<div class='reading'></div> <div class='meaning'>Once upon a time, an old man and old woman lived in a certain place.&nbsp;</div> <div class='notes'></div>       
 <div class='expression'>二人は子どもがいなかったので、シロというイヌをとてもかわいがっていました。</div>         	<div class='reading'></div> <div class='meaning'>Because the two people didn't have any children, they had a very cute dog names Shiro.</div> <div class='notes'></div>       
 <div class='expression'>ある日、シロが畑でほえました。</div>         	<div class='reading'>ある<ruby><rb>日</rb><rt>ひ</rt></ruby>、シロが<ruby><rb>畑</rb><rt>はたけ</rt></ruby>でほえました。</div> <div class='meaning'>One day, Shiro barked while in the field.</div> <div class='notes'><div>ある日 - (noun; expression) one day...</div>畑 - (noun) field (for fruits, vegetables, etc.); cultivated land; vegetable plot; kitchen garden; plantation​<div>ほえる - (ru-verb) to bark; to bay; to howl; to bellow; to roar; to cry</div></div>       
 <div class='expression'>「ここほれワンワン、ここほれワンワン」</div>         	<div class='reading'></div> <div class='meaning'>Dig here, ruff ruff.&nbsp;Dig here, ruff ruff.</div> <div class='notes'>掘る - (ru-verb) to dig</div>       
 <div class='expression'>「おや？　ここをほれと言っているのか。よしよし、ほってやろう」</div>         	<div class='reading'></div> <div class='meaning'>Oh? Are you saying to dig here? Alright, alright, let's dig.</div> <div class='notes'></div>       
 <div class='expression'><div>おじいさんがほってみると、</div><div>「ややっ、これはすごい！」</div></div>         	"<div class='reading'></div> <div class='meaning'>The old man tried to dig, and he said ""Ya ya. This is amazing.""&nbsp;</div> <div class='notes'></div>       "
 <div class='expression'>なんと、 地面の中から大判小判がザクザクと出てきたのです。</div>         	<div class='reading'>なんと、<ruby><rb>地</rb><rt>じ</rt></ruby><ruby><rb>面</rb><rt>めん</rt></ruby>の中から<ruby><rb>大</rb><rt>おお</rt></ruby><ruby><rb>判</rb><rt>ばん</rt></ruby><ruby><rb>小</rb><rt>こ</rt></ruby><ruby><rb>判</rb><rt>ばん</rt></ruby> がザクザクと出てきたのです</div> <div class='meaning'>Amazingly, he discovered a large amount of large and small gold coins from within the ground.</div> <div class='notes'>地面 - (noun) ground; earth's surface​<div>大判  - (noun) large oval Japanese gold coin​</div><div>小判 - (noun) koban; small former Japanese oval gold coin​</div><div>ザクザク - (adverb) lots of coins or jewels​ (Onomatopoeic or mimetic word)</div></div>       
 <div class='expression'><div>この話を聞いた、となりの欲ばりじいさんが、</div><div>「わしも、大判小判を手に入れる。」</div></div>         	"<div class='reading'><div>この<ruby><rb>話</rb><rt>はなし</rt></ruby>を<ruby><rb>聞</rb><rt>き</rt></ruby>いた、となりの<ruby><rb>欲</rb><rt>よく</rt></ruby>ばりじいさんが、</div><div>「わしも、<ruby><rb>大</rb><rt>おお</rt></ruby><ruby><rb>判</rb><rt>ばん</rt></ruby><ruby><rb>小</rb><rt>こ</rt></ruby><ruby><rb>判</rb><rt>ばん</rt></ruby> を<ruby><rb>手</rb><rt>て</rt></ruby>に<ruby><rb>入</rb><rt>い</rt></ruby>れる。」</div></div> <div class='meaning'>Having heard this story, the greedy old man next store said, ""I will also obtain large and small gold coins.""</div> <div class='notes'><div>欲ばり - (noun; na-adj) greed; avarice; covetousness; greedy person​</div>手に入れる - (ru-verb) to obtain; to procure​</div>       "
 <div class='expression'>おめえのシロを、わしに貸してくれや」</div>         	"<div class='reading'>おめえのシロを、わしに<ruby><rb>貸</rb><rt>か</rt></ruby>してくれや」</div> <div class='meaning'>""Please lend me that Shiro of yours.""</div> <div class='notes'></div>       "
 <div class='expression'>欲ばりじいさんが、シロを無理矢理畑に連れて行きました。</div>         	<div class='reading'><ruby><rb>欲</rb><rt>よく</rt></ruby>ばりじいさんが、シロを<ruby><rb>無</rb><rt>む</rt></ruby><ruby><rb>理</rb><rt>り</rt></ruby><ruby><rb>矢</rb><rt>や</rt></ruby><ruby><rb>理</rb><rt>り</rt></ruby><ruby><rb>畑</rb><rt>はたけ</rt></ruby>に<ruby><rb>連</rb><rt>つ</rt></ruby>れて<ruby><rb>行</rb><rt>い</rt></ruby>きました。</div> <div class='meaning'>The greedy old man forcibly brought Shiro with him to the field.</div> <div class='notes'><div>無理矢理 - (adv) forcibly; against one's will</div>連れる - (ru-verb) to take (someone) with one; to bring along; to go with; to be accompanied by​</div>       
 <div class='expression'>そして、いやがるシロがキャンキャンないたところをほってみると、くさいゴミがたくさん出てきました。</div>         	<div class='reading'>そして、いやがるシロがキャンキャンないたところをほってみると、くさいゴミがたくさん<ruby><rb>出</rb><rt>で</rt></ruby>てきました。</div> <div class='meaning'>And then, if he tried to dig where the hated Shiro barked, a lot of smelly garbage was unearthed.</div> <div class='notes'>いやがる - (u-verb) to hate; to dislike​<div>鳴く - (u-verb) to make sound (animal); to call; to cry; to chirp​<br /><div>くさい - (i-adj) stinking; smelly​; suspicious; fishy​</div><div>ゴミ - (noun) rubbish; trash; garbage; refuse</div></div></div>       
 <div class='expression'>「この役立たずのイヌめ！」</div>         	<div class='reading'>「この<ruby><rb>役</rb><rt>やく</rt></ruby><ruby><rb>立</rb><rt>た</rt></ruby>たずのイヌめ！」</div> <div class='meaning'>That useless dog!</div> <div class='notes'>役立たず - (no-adj) useless; deadhead​<div>め - (suffix) derogatory suffix (referring to others)​</div></div>       
 <div class='expression'>怒ったよくばりじいさんは、なんと、シロを殴り殺してしまったのです。</div>         	"<div class='reading'><ruby><rb>怒</rb><rt>おこ</rt></ruby>ったよくばりじいさんは、なんと、シロを<ruby><rb>殴</rb><rt>なぐ</rt></ruby>り<ruby><rb>殺</rb><rt>ころ</rt></ruby>してしまったのです。</div> <div class='meaning'>The angered, greedy old man, surprisingly, beat Shiro to death.&nbsp;</div> <div class='notes'><div>なんと - ""What!"" used as a phrase meaning surprise.</div>殴り殺す - (u-verb) to strike dead; to beat to death</div>       "
 <div class='expression'>シロを殺されたおじいさんとおばあさんは、なくなく、シロを畑にうめてやると、棒を立ててお墓を作りました。</div>         	<div class='reading'>シロを<ruby><rb>殺</rb><rt>ころ</rt></ruby>されたおじいさんとおばあさんは、なくなく、シロを畑にうめてやると、<ruby><rb>棒</rb><rt>ぼう</rt></ruby>を立ててお<ruby><rb>墓</rb><rt>はか</rt></ruby>を<ruby><rb>作</rb><rt>つく</rt></ruby>りました。</div> <div class='meaning'>The old man and old woman of Shiro, who was killed, tearfully buried Shiro in in the field and stood a stick to make a grave.&nbsp;</div> <div class='notes'>なくなく - (adverb) tearfully; with (in) tears; weeping; crying​<div>埋める - (ru-verb) to bury (e.g. in the ground)​</div><div>棒 - (noun) pole; rod; stick​</div><div>立てて - (adv) especially; particularly; wholeheartedly</div><div>お墓 - (noun) gravesite; tomb</div></div>       
 <div class='expression'>次の日、おじいさんとおばあさんがシロのお墓参りに畑へ行ってみると、シロのお墓の棒が、ひと晩のうちに大木になっていたのです。</div>         	<div class='reading'><ruby><rb>次</rb><rt>つぎ</rt></ruby>の<ruby><rb>日</rb><rt>ひ</rt></ruby>、おじいさんとおばあさんがシロのお<ruby><rb>墓</rb><rt>はか</rt></ruby><ruby><rb>参</rb><rt>まい</rt></ruby>りに畑へ行ってみると、シロのお<ruby><rb>墓</rb><rt>はか</rt></ruby>の<ruby><rb>棒</rb><rt>ぼう</rt></ruby>が、ひと<ruby><rb>晩</rb><rt>ばん</rt></ruby>のうちに<ruby><rb>大</rb><rt>たい</rt></ruby><ruby><rb>木</rb><rt>ぼく</rt></ruby>になっていたのです。</div> <div class='meaning'>The next day, the old man and old woman tried to go towards the field to visit the grave of Shiro, but it was that the stick of shiro's grave had become a large tree during the night.</div> <div class='notes'>墓参り - (noun; suru-verb) visit to a grave<div>ひと晩 - (adverbial noun) one night; one evening; all night; overnight</div><div>うち - (noun; no-adj) inside; within​; while</div><div>大木 - (noun) large tree</div></div>       
 <div class='expression'>おじいさんとおばあさんは、その木で臼を作って、おもちをつきました。</div>         	<div class='reading'>おじいさんとおばあさんは、その<ruby><rb>木</rb><rt>き</rt></ruby>で<ruby><rb>臼</rb><rt>うす</rt></ruby>を作って、おもちをつきました。</div> <div class='meaning'>The old man and old woman made a mortar with that tree and made mochi rice.&nbsp;</div> <div class='notes'>臼 - (noun) millstone; mortar<div>おもち - (noun) rice cakes; pounded mochi rice​</div><div><ruby><rb>搗く</rb><rt>つく</rt></ruby> - to hull (rice, barley, etc.); to pound (rice); to polish (rice); to stamp (ore)​</div></div>       
 <div class='expression'>すると不思議な事に、もちの中から宝物がたくさん出てきました。</div>         	<div class='reading'>すると<ruby><rb>不</rb><rt>ふ</rt></ruby><ruby><rb>思</rb><rt>し</rt></ruby><ruby><rb>議</rb><rt>ぎ</rt></ruby>な<ruby><rb>事</rb><rt>こと</rt></ruby>に、もちの<ruby><rb>中</rb><rt>なか</rt></ruby>から<ruby><rb>宝</rb><rt>たから</rt></ruby><ruby><rb>物</rb><rt>もの</rt></ruby>がたくさん出てきました。</div> <div class='meaning'>Thereupon was a wonderful thing, from inside the mochi rice a lot of treasure was brought out.&nbsp;</div> <div class='notes'><div>すると - (conjunction) thereupon; hereupon​</div>不思議 - (na-adj) wonderful; marvelous; strange; incredible; amazing; curious; miraculous; mysterious​<div>宝物 - (noun) treasure; treasured item; prized possession</div></div>       
 <div class='expression'><div>それを聞いた、欲ばりじいさんは、</div><div>「わしも、もちをついて宝を手に入れる。</div></div>         	"<div class='reading'><div>それを聞いた、欲ばりじいさんは、</div><div>「わしも、もちをついて<ruby><rb>宝</rb><rt>たから</rt></ruby>を手に入れる。</div></div> <div class='meaning'>The greedy old man who heard this said, ""I will make mochi and obtain the treasure.""</div> <div class='notes'><div><ruby><rb>突</rb><rt>つ</rt></ruby>く - (u-verb) to hull (rice, barley, etc.); to pound (rice); to polish (rice); to stamp (ore)​</div>宝 - (noun) treasure<div>手に入れる - (ru-verb) to obtain; to procure</div><div><br /></div><div>Mochi is made by pounding rice into paste.</div></div>       "
 <div class='expression'><div>おめえの臼を、わしに貸してくれや」</div><div>と、臼を無理矢理かりると、自分の家でもちをついてみました。</div></div>         	"<div class='reading'><div>おめえの<ruby><rb>臼</rb><rt>うす</rt></ruby>を、わしに<ruby><rb>貸</rb><rt>か</rt></ruby>してくれや」</div><div>と、<ruby><rb>臼</rb><rt>うす</rt></ruby>を<ruby><rb>無</rb><rt>む</rt></ruby><ruby><rb>理</rb><rt>り</rt></ruby><ruby><rb>矢</rb><rt>や</rt></ruby><ruby><rb>理</rb><rt>り</rt></ruby>かりると、　<ruby><rb>自</rb><rt>じ</rt></ruby><ruby><rb>分</rb><rt>ぶん</rt></ruby>の<ruby><rb>家</rb><rt>いえ</rt></ruby>でもちをついてみました。</div></div> <div class='meaning'>""Please lend your mortar to me,"" he said. The old man forcibly borrowed the mortar and tried making mochi in his own home.<br /></div> <div class='notes'>かりる - ((ru-verb) to borrow; to have a loan​<div>搗く - (u-verb) to hull (rice, barley, etc.); to pound (rice); to polish (rice); to stamp (ore)​</div></div>       "
 <div class='expression'>しかし、出てくるのは石ころばかりで、宝物は出てきません。</div>         	<div class='reading'>しかし、<ruby><rb>出</rb><rt>で</rt></ruby>てくるのは<ruby><rb>石</rb><rt>いし</rt></ruby>ころばかりで、<ruby><rb>宝</rb><rt>たから</rt></ruby><ruby><rb>物</rb><rt>もの</rt></ruby>は<ruby><rb>出</rb><rt>で</rt></ruby>てきません。</div> <div class='meaning'>However, what came out was nothing but pebbles, and treasure did not come out.&nbsp;</div> <div class='notes'>しかし - (conjunction) However; but<div>出てくる - (ku-verb) to come out; to appear; to turn up; to emerge​<br /><div>石ころ - (noun) stone; rock; pebble​<br /><div>宝物 - (noun) treasure; treasured item; prized possession​</div></div></div></div>       
 <div class='expression'>「いまいましい臼め！」</div>         	"<div class='reading'>「いまいましい<ruby><rb>臼</rb><rt>うす</rt></ruby>め！」</div> <div class='meaning'>""You annoying mortar!""</div> <div class='notes'>いまいましい - (i-adj) annoying; provoking</div>       "
 <div class='expression'>怒った欲ばりじいさんは、臼をオノでたたきわると、焼いて灰にしてしまいました。</div>         	<div class='reading'><ruby><rb>怒</rb><rt>おこ</rt></ruby>った<ruby><rb>欲</rb><rt>よく</rt></ruby>ばりじいさんは、<ruby><rb>臼</rb><rt>うさ</rt></ruby>をオノでたたきわると、<ruby><rb>焼</rb><rt>や</rt></ruby>いて<ruby><rb>灰</rb><rt>はい</rt></ruby>にしてしまいました。</div> <div class='meaning'>The angered, greedy old man smashed the mortar in the field and burned it to ashes.&nbsp;</div> <div class='notes'>たたきわる - (u-verb) to smash; to break into pieces​<div><ruby><rb>野</rb><rt>の</rt></ruby> - (noun) field; plain</div><div>焼く - (u-verb) to burn</div><div>灰 - (noun) ash; ashes</div></div>       
 <div class='expression'>大切な臼を焼かれたおじいさんは、せめて灰だけでもと、臼を焼いた灰をザルに入れて持ち帰ろうとしました。</div>         	<div class='reading'><ruby><rb>大</rb><rt>たい</rt></ruby><ruby><rb>切</rb><rt>せつ</rt></ruby>な<ruby><rb>臼</rb><rt>うす</rt></ruby>を<ruby><rb>焼</rb><rt>や</rt></ruby>かれたおじいさんは、せめて<ruby><rb>灰</rb><rt>はい</rt></ruby>だけでもと、<ruby><rb>臼</rb><rt>うす</rt></ruby>を<ruby><rb>焼</rb><rt>や</rt></ruby>いた<ruby><rb>灰</rb><rt>はい</rt></ruby>をザルに<ruby><rb>入</rb><rt>い</rt></ruby>れて<ruby><rb>持</rb><rt>も</rt></ruby>ち<ruby><rb>帰</rb><rt>かえ</rt></ruby>ろうとしました。</div> <div class='meaning'>Though there were at most only ashes, the old man who had burnt the important mortar put the ashes of the burnt mortar in a ザル and attempted to bring it back.&nbsp;</div> <div class='notes'>大切 - (na-adj) important; necessary; indispensable​; beloved; precious; dear; cherished; valuable​<div>せめて - (adverb) at least; at most</div><div>ザル - (noun) Bamboo draining basket</div><div>持ち帰る - (u-verb) to bring back; to carry home; to take out (e.g. food)​</div></div>       
 <div class='expression'>その時、灰が風に飛ばされて、枯れ木にフワリとかかりました。</div>         	<div class='reading'>その<ruby><rb>時</rb><rt>とき</rt></ruby>、<ruby><rb>灰</rb><rt>はい</rt></ruby>が<ruby><rb>風</rb><rt>かぜ</rt></ruby>に<ruby><rb>飛</rb><rt>と</rt></ruby>ばされて、<ruby><rb>枯</rb><rt>か</rt></ruby>れ<ruby><rb>木</rb><rt>き</rt></ruby>にフワリとかかりました。</div> <div class='meaning'>At that time, the ashes were blown off by the wind and were gently caught in a dead tree.</div> <div class='notes'>風 - (noun) wind; breeze; draught; draft​<div>飛ばす - (u-verb) to let fly; to make fly; to send flying; to blow off (e.g. in the wind); to launch; to fire; to hurl; to shoot​</div><div>枯れ木 - (noun) dead tree; withered tree​; leafless tree; bare tree​</div><div>フワリ -  ふわり - (adverb taking と particle) softly; gently; lightly</div><div>掛かる - (u-verb) to be caught in</div></div>       
 <div class='expression'>すると、どうでしょう。</div>         	<div class='reading'>すると、どうでしょう。</div> <div class='meaning'>Thereupon, how was it?</div> <div class='notes'>すると - thereupon; hereupon</div>       
 <div class='expression'>灰のかかった枯れ木に、満開の花が咲いたのです。</div>         	<div class='reading'><ruby><rb>灰</rb><rt>はい</rt></ruby>のかかった<ruby><rb>枯</rb><rt>か</rt></ruby>れ<ruby><rb>木</rb><rt>き</rt></ruby>に、<ruby><rb>満</rb><rt>まん</rt></ruby><ruby><rb>開</rb><rt>かい</rt></ruby>の<ruby><rb>花</rb><rt>はな</rt></ruby>が<ruby><rb>咲</rb><rt>さ</rt></ruby>いたのです。</div> <div class='meaning'>It is that blossoms bloomed full on the dead tree in which the ashes were caught.</div> <div class='notes'>掛かる - (u-verb) to be caught in<div>満開 - (no-adj) full bloom (esp. of cherry blossom); full blossom</div></div>       
 <div class='expression'>おじいさんは、うれしくなって。</div>         	<div class='reading'></div> <div class='meaning'>The old man became happy.&nbsp;</div> <div class='notes'>嬉しい - (i-adj) happy; glad; pleasant​</div>       
 <div class='expression'><div>「枯れ木に花を咲かせましょう。パアーッ」</div><div>と、いいながら、次々に灰をまいて、枯れ木に美しい花を咲かせました。</div></div>         	"<div class='reading'><div>「<ruby><rb>枯</rb><rt>か</rt></ruby>れ<ruby><rb>木</rb><rt>き</rt></ruby>に<ruby><rb>花</rb><rt>はな</rt></ruby>を<ruby><rb>咲</rb><rt>さ</rt></ruby>かせましょう。パアーッ」</div><div>と、いいながら、<ruby><rb>次々</rb><rt>つぎつぎ</rt></ruby>に<ruby><rb>灰</rb><rt>はい</rt></ruby>をまいて、<ruby><rb>枯</rb><rt>か</rt></ruby>れ<ruby><rb>木</rb><rt>き</rt></ruby>に<ruby><rb>美</rb><rt>うつく</rt></ruby>しい<ruby><rb>花</rb><rt>はな</rt></ruby>を<ruby><rb>咲</rb><rt>さ</rt></ruby>かせました。</div></div> <div class='meaning'>""Let's make the blossoms in the dead tree bloom. Paa,"" he said. While saying these words, he scattered the ashes one-by-one and made the lovely blossoms bloom in the dead tree.</div> <div class='notes'><div>次々 - (adverb) in succession; one by one​</div><div><ruby><rb>撒</rb><rt>ま</rt></ruby>く - (u-verb) to scatter; to sprinkle; to strew​</div>美しい - (i-adj) beautiful; lovely​<div>いいながら - while saying</div></div>       "
 <div class='expression'>ちょうどそこへ、お城のお殿さまが通りかかりました。</div>         	<div class='reading'>ちょうどそこへ、お<ruby><rb>城</rb><rt>しろ</rt></ruby>のお<ruby><rb>殿</rb><rt>との</rt></ruby>さまが<ruby><rb>通</rb><rt>とお</rt></ruby>りかかりました。</div> <div class='meaning'>Right there, the lord of a castle happened to pass by.</div> <div class='notes'><div>ちょうどそこへ - right there</div>お城 - (noun) castle<div>殿 - (noun) feudal lord<br /><div>通りかかる - (u-verb) to happen to pass by​</div></div></div>       
 <div class='expression'>「ほう、これは見事じゃ」</div>         	<div class='reading'>「ほう、これは<ruby><rb>見</rb><rt>み</rt></ruby><ruby><rb>事</rb><rt>ごと</rt></ruby>じゃ」</div> <div class='meaning'>Hoo, that is something worth seeing.</div> <div class='notes'>見事 - (noun) something worth seeing; sight; spectacle​</div>       
 <div class='expression'>お殿さまはたいそう喜んで、おじいさんにたくさんのほうびをあげました。</div>         	<div class='reading'>お<ruby><rb>殿</rb><rt>との</rt></ruby>さまはたいそう<ruby><rb>喜</rb><rt>よろこ</rt></ruby>んで、おじいさんにたくさんのほうびをあげました。</div> <div class='meaning'>The feudal lord was extremey pleased and gave many prizes to the old man.</div> <div class='notes'><div>たいそう - (adverb) very; extremely; exceedingly; greatly; terribly</div>喜ぶ - (u-verb) to be delighted; to be glad; to be pleased​<div>ほうび - (noun) reward; prize</div></div>       
 <div class='expression'><div>それを見ていた欲ばりじいさんが、</div><div>「おい、わしも花を咲かせてほうびをもらう。その灰を、わしによこせ！」</div></div>         	"<div class='reading'><div>それを見ていた欲ばりじいさんが、</div><div>「おい、わしも<ruby><rb>花</rb><rt>はな</rt></ruby>を<ruby><rb>咲</rb><rt>さ</rt></ruby>かせてほうびをもらう。その<ruby><rb>灰</rb><rt>はい</rt></ruby>を、わしによこせ！」</div></div> <div class='meaning'>The greedy old man who saw this said ""Hey, I will also receive a prize for making the blossoms bloom. Hand over those ashes.""</div> <div class='notes'>よこす - (u-verb) to hand over (e.g. money) <div>ほうび - (noun) reward; prize</div></div>       "
 <div class='expression'>無理矢理に灰を取り上げると、お殿さまに言いました、</div>         	<div class='reading'>無理矢理に灰を取り上げると、お殿さまに言いました、</div> <div class='meaning'>He took away the ashes forcefully, and said to the feudal lord,...</div> <div class='notes'>取り上げる - (ru-verb) to take away; to confiscate; to deprive (someone) of; to revoke​</div>       
 <div class='expression'>「殿さま、この灰はわしの物です。わしが枯れ木に花を咲かせますから、わしにもほうびを下さい。バァーッ！」</div>         	"<div class='reading'>「殿さま、この灰はわしの物です。わしが枯れ木に花を咲かせますから、わしにもほうびを下さい。バァーッ！」</div> <div class='meaning'>""Lord-sama, These ashes are my things. &nbsp;Since I made the blossoms of the bare tree bloom, please also give me a prize. Baaa!""</div> <div class='notes'></div>       "
 <div class='expression'>欲ばりじいさんは、殿さまの前でたくさん花を咲かせようと、灰をいっせいにまきました。</div>         	<div class='reading'></div> <div class='meaning'>The greedy old man wanted to make many blossoms bloom in front of the lord-sama and he scattered the ashes all at once.&nbsp;</div> <div class='notes'>いっせい - (noun) simultaneous; all at once​<div>まく - (u-verb) to scatter; to sprinkle; to strew</div></div>       
 <div class='expression'>すると灰がお殿さまの目に入って、欲ばりじいさんはお殿さまの家来にさんざん殴られたということです。</div>         	<div class='reading'>すると灰がお殿さまの<ruby><rb>目</rb><rt>め</rt></ruby>に<ruby><rb>入</rb><rt>はい</rt></ruby>って、欲ばりじいさんはお殿さまの<ruby><rb>家</rb><rt>け</rt></ruby><ruby><rb>来</rb><rt>らい</rt></ruby>にさんざん<ruby><rb>殴</rb><rt>なぐ</rt></ruby>られたということです。</div> <div class='meaning'>Thereupon, the ashes entered the eyes of the lord-sama, and it was that the greedy old man was thoroughly beaten by the lord-sama's retainer.&nbsp;</div> <div class='notes'>家来 - (noun) retainer; retinue; servant​<div>さんざん - (adverb) thoroughly; completely; utterly; ​severely; harshly; terribly; miserably; wretchedly; badly​</div></div>       
 <div class='expression'>シロクマくん　動物園へ</div>         	<div class='reading'></div> <div class='meaning'></div> <div class='notes'></div>       
 <div class='expression'>シロクマくん　暇だから　何か問題出してよ</div>         	<div class='reading'>シロクマくん　<ruby><rb>暇</rb><rt>ひま</rt></ruby>だから　何か<ruby><rb>問</rb><rt>もん</rt></ruby><ruby><rb>題</rb><rt>だい</rt></ruby><ruby><rb>出</rb><rt>だ</rt></ruby>してよ</div> <div class='meaning'>Polar Bear, Since I'm free, please give me some problem.&nbsp;</div> <div class='notes'></div>       
 <div class='expression'>いいよ</div>         	<div class='reading'></div> <div class='meaning'></div> <div class='notes'></div>

"ここまできて, あきらめる<span style=""font-weight: 600;color: rgb(0, 0, 255)"">[...]</span>。"	  <div class='notes'>233 Special Expressions - Hypothesizing and Concluding - Coming to a conclusion with 「わけ」 - uncommon way to formally say something must be done at all cost.</div> Definitions:<br><br>あきらめる - (ru-verb)&nbsp;to give up; to abandon (hope, plans); to resign oneself (to)​
"ここまできて, あきらめる<span style=""font-weight: 600;color: rgb(0, 0, 255)"">わけにはいかない</span>。"	<div class='notes'>233 Special Expressions - Hypothesizing and Concluding - Coming to a conclusion with 「わけ」 - uncommon way to formally say something must be done at all cost.</div> Definitions:<br><br>あきらめる - (ru-verb)&nbsp;to give up; to abandon (hope, plans); to resign oneself (to)​
窓を開けたとたんに、猫が跳んで行った。	<div class='notes'>245 Special Expressions - Express what occured immediately after with [とたん].&nbsp;</div> Definitions:<br><br>跳ぶ - (u-verb) to jump
映画を見たとたんに、眠くなりました。	<div class='notes'>245 Special Expressions - Express what occured immediately after with [とたん].&nbsp;</div> Definitions:<br><br>
 <div class='expression'>（ナレーション） ダイブ マッシブリー マルチプレーヤー</div>         	<div class='reading'></div> <div class='meaning'></div> <div class='notes'></div>

 <div class='expression'>それじゃ…　どうぞ</div>         	<div class='reading'></div> <div class='meaning'>Well then...please.&nbsp;</div> <div class='notes'>それじゃ - (expression) well then...</div>       
 <div class='expression'>さっき言ったじゃないですか　なおさんにプレゼントをあげたいって</div>         	<div class='reading'></div> <div class='meaning'>Is that not what I said just now? &nbsp;I said I wanted to give a present to Nao-san.</div> <div class='notes'>さっき - (adverbial noun; noun) some time ago; just now​</div>       
 <div class='expression'>このマンドレイクがプレゼントです</div>         	<div class='reading'></div> <div class='meaning'>This Mandrake is the present.&nbsp;</div> <div class='notes'></div>       
 <div class='expression'>これからの私たちの友情の証です</div>         	<div class='reading'>これからの私たちの<ruby><rb>友</rb><rt>ゆう</rt></ruby><ruby><rb>情</rb><rt>じょう</rt></ruby>の<ruby><rb>証</rb><rt>あかし</rt></ruby>です</div> <div class='meaning'>It is a symbol of our friendship which is starting after this.&nbsp;</div> <div class='notes'>友情 - (noun) friendship; fellowship; camaraderie​<div>証 - (noun) symbol; emblem​; evidence; proof​</div></div>       
 <div class='expression'>いらない</div>         	<div class='reading'></div> <div class='meaning'></div> <div class='notes'></div>
